column4: im using ubuntu 12.10 32bit, google earth crashes on me and so does braid the video game
what video chip do you use?
it must be an ati im not sure
sudo lshw -C display     will tell you
i know i have an ati raedeon
wait, it will say. Your PCI bus is slow
<ActionParsnip>  i get alot of lines...heres one line  product: RS880 [Radeon HD 4200]
what is the product line please, I can't view pastebins using the connection I have
http://ubuntuxtreme.com/howto/how-to-fix-your-amd-graphics-in-ubuntu-12-10/  use the Makarewicz PPA in the middle of the page
thank you ActionParsnip that was fast
i've seen the issue a lot in here so I know what to search for
wont doing all this ruin future upgrade to fglrx and xorg
ima reboot and see how things go thanks
